analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.frequency.tfidf.TfidfConsumer
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This consumer builds a DfModel. It collects the df (document frequency) counts for the processed collection. The counts are serialized as a DfModel-object.
